subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Friday’s game between the Anaheim Ducks and the New Jersey Devils likely marked the last time Teemu Selanne would play in the N.H.L. against Jaromir Jagr.
snippet: Friday’s game between the Anaheim Ducks and the New Jersey Devils likely marked the last time Teemu Selanne would play in the N.H.L. against Jaromir Jagr.
